reviews: I would give the Valentin 10 stars! Our 5th time back! It's been 5 years since we've been here.  Valentin gets better every time! The staff and service is impeccable! The staff is friendly and offers to help you, from the grounds keeper to the concierge.  The food in all the restaurants are delicious!  They will adapt the menu the best they can for diet allergies.      I have to mention names,  as these employees go above and beyond in service.     Dora ; guest experience coordinator.  She remembers every guest! Always taking time to talk to us and get to know us.  She is so helpful and professional.  I'm glad you are back my Dora! You have become a good friend.   Other employees that stand out,      Miguel; the waiter at Terra restaurant.  Noemi ,manager, and Daretza, hostess

The service is amazing, the staff is very polite and nice and whole place is very clean 👌 the food is excellent and the drinks they are excellent. We like hibachi and all the activities around the pool. We like Lorenzo supervisor and Dora guest experience coordinator. Chicago will be back.   High recommendation!!!

I stayed here for over a week back in March. This resort exceeded all of my expectations. I wrote a blog post on my travel blog so if you're interested in reading a detailed review just message me for the link!  I normally stay at Excellence Riviera Cancun and this resort was slightly better in almost every category, so if you have specific questions regarding the comparison between resorts just message me. We never went hungry, we are not foodies by definition but we know good food and this resort has that. Drink service at the pools was fairly slow, but you're never further than 30 seconds away from the closest bars so it never became an issue.   We also had the Prive package, the best inclusions of this are 1. being able to reserve bali beds at the pool and 2. being able to

Dora, the experience coordinator, and Jorge are the best!!!  Very relaxing, support staff , hospitality.    The main pool is always a fun time and we enjoy the people watching with free flowing drinks.    We always see Dora working around the pool.  She is one of the best at Valentín.  She deserves a raise.

Dora is the best in hospitality for experience coordinator.  She makes our day better every day that we see her.  Jorge is the best waiter at the buffet!   Grounds are amazing and perfectly groomed.  This is our 9th time visiting and we will always come back.

Well we had the time of our lives here!  This vacation to V.I.R.M. was a first for us but we don't want to go anywhere else!  We can't wait to return!  Everything about the resort far exceeded anything we could have expected, but the most outstanding part of all was the staff.  Everyone was so friendly, cheerful, and helpful. We tried to keep track of all the folks we would wish to recognize and we have a list but there are many who deserve mention, we just failed to get a name.  Here is who we have... > Dora, of course! > Jorge, Le Marche > Jesus, Le Marche > Miguel, bldg #2 Concierge > Oscar, a Concierge > Roberto > Diego, Martini Bar > Abigail, Martini Bar > Caleb > Angeles > Floraida, Gift shop > Lazy River Drink Bar and all servers > Lazy River Lunch Bar, and all  servers >

The resort and the staff were excellent. The rooms were very clean and the beds were extremely comfortable. The pool was amazing and the swim up bar was perfect to stay in the pool all day. There were several activities at the main pool that kept us entertained all day as well as live music and shows every night.  All of the staff was friendly and they make delicious drinks. Dora was very sweet and checked in on us every day to make sure we had everything we needed. We will definitely come back to this resort.

I've been to several all inclusive resorts in Mexico and this one is by far the best. The food is excellent, specially the French restaurant and the Taco trucks at the main pool, yummy! The staff is super friendly, especially Dora! She makes you feel at home and like she's your best friend, love her! Will definitely return!!!

We had an excellent stay!  Our room was nice and clean. The food and drinks were all very good. The Go Team are fun and entertaining. The entire staff are awesome!  Dora in Guest Experience is always amazing and so very friendly!  Can’t wait for trip number 10!

We stayed in a junior suite. The rooms are clean and large enough and have a couch and desk. What more can you ask for. The beds are super comfortable and at the end of the night, that is what you want most. We did have an issue with my parent’s bed having a nook and they corrected that within two hours of us mentioning it. The customer service and attention to detail is remarkable. The mini fridge is fully stocked with water, beer, juice, soda, diet soda, and chips. The shampoo and soap are made with local honey and smell divine. Everything is relatively close and since the greenery is superb it provides shade and it feels like you are in a little jungle. The restaurants are all next to each other except Mar y Tierra that is by the beach but again, relatively close. With

They offer amazing food and activities that are easy to book right at the resort. We went 5 years ago for our honeymoon and just now for our 5 year anniversary and was able to see Dora again who was as helpful now as when we first met her. I definitely recommend visiting this resort!

The Valentin Imperial Riviera Maya was an exceptional resort to stay at.   I traveled to this resort with my wife to celebrate her 30th birthday along with our 5-year anniversary and it was amazing.  If you're looking for nightlife every night they have some sort of entertainment for you to enjoy along with music and a DJ in the plaza. If you're looking for a fun environment to hang out the main pool is the place to be during the day. The GO Entertainment team was phenomenal. They try to get the crowd involved with everything they do. You have to do the "magic carpet" run...racing people on the floating mats across the pool. If you're looking for a more relaxed feel they have two smaller pools, one by the main pool and one that curves around a couple of the buildings. They both

This place was wonderful!  The staff go out of their way to make your time memorable.  Dora found me and asked me if I had any feedback and was so kind, and Abner was our concierge on the beach all week and was really helpful.  The food was really good (especially the Mexican restaurant) and there were lots of options for all different types of food.  The churros at night were awesome too.  Beach beds were just wonderful.  The band at night was fun too!  Would love to come back!

We couldn’t have asked for a better experience! We hung out by the pool most days and had the best of time! Drinks was great and so was the food. Evening every dinner was amazing! Shows was great at night and the band was to die for! To say the least we had a great time and definitely will be back!

By far the best resort that I have been to. Everyone was super friendly. Food is amazing and always fresh. We always found a place to be at on the beach. There is a lazy River pool where you can go if you want to escape the loud music at the main pool. Pool side food is also amazing. Will be returning to this hotel!

Just returned from our 9th trip. This place is incredible!  The grounds are beautiful. The staff is amazing!  The food was fantastic and plenty to choose from.  Don Miguel’s is our favorite bar. The Go team are always fun and entertaining. Dora in guest experience is always a delight to visit with and will make sure you are having a great time.  We will definitely be back!

It was truly a great experience for us! We spent 9 days there. My husband and I both are deaf and the staff has made sure that our accommodations were met. While we may not use the same language, they were willing to find different ways to communicate with us! Hats off to some special staff down there- Dora, Lorenzo, Eduardo, Angel, all the servers at the pool and restaurants, and Miguel.  The resort itself is just stunning!! The pictures do not do its justice! The drinks at the bars were fantastic and we loved how we got to visit every restaurant each night. Cafe Sisal was amazing- we got our coffee every morning there. You must visit the churro stand, too! We got churros every night we were there! It was worth our money. It is highly recommended to visit this beautiful

The most perfect resort my we have ever been to! Service was seamless perfection, our room was impeccable. My partner and I are both in the hospitality industry, and were genuinely blown away by how hospitable everyone was in Valentin.  As a resort, Valentin had a lot to offer to make our stay was memorable, ranging from multiple different styles of restaurants to ensure we don't get redundant meals, to poolside and beachside service that was always on time. I highly recommend you take advantage of the local mini-excursions they offer at the beach (not free), and go to the nightly shows they offer (free). Don't forget Don Miguel between meals and events! The cocktails there are not something to be missed! Also, I'd recommend you find Dora (she will probably find you anyway, look

My family's visit to The Valentin was second to none. From the second we arrived at The Valentin we were impressed by the hospitality from the staff, as well as the resort's appearance. I appreciated the attention to detail throughout the entire check in process. Our room was well kept and up to date. The pool area, where we spent most of our time, was spectacular. It was obviously well-maintained and all of the staff such as the bartenders, GO Team, waiters, and Dora were very friendly and personable. We really appreciated the activities put on by the staff such as the pool volleyball games, foam party, and mechanical bull. It's apparent that the staff wants the guests to have a fun experience, and that's exactly what we had. We enjoyed every moment of our stay and would

This was our first time visiting. The hotel was amazing and beautiful. The food and drinks were fabulous. Employees and staff were very helpful. Raul works at the main pool. Very good drinks and sevices. Carols works at main pool and always has fast service with drinks. Heraclio has a great personality. He will find you when needed. All of the staff around the restaurants and pools are very friendly and great to talk to. Find Dora. This lady is trusting and  amazing. She will get you anything you need. Very approachable. Everything is very special if you need it to be.

The service at this resort is excellent, one of our waiters at the Mexican restaurant Hugo, was so helpful and accommodating . Also, Antonio at the beach privilege section was excellent. These gentlemen are just a few of the outstanding staff. They go above what you’d expect.

I would like to set expectations for anybody coming to this resort because the reviews and marketing do not reflect the reality. Generally I would recommend this to people who are OK with 3-4 star service. The resort advertises itself as 5 star but it is nowhere near other hotels that offer refined 5 star service.   Why trust my review? I travel for work and privately regularly, so have seen many different types of hotels including all inclusives. My husband is a chef who has worked for several hotels (3 to 5 stars) and he comes from a family who works in hospitality. I’ve taken his feedback into this review considering some of these things occurred to him.   Pros:   > Staff are friendly and usually always have a smile and jokes.  > La Hacienda (Mexican food) restaurant was good

This place is 5+ Star resort for every Adult. The staff is top notch, from house keeping, to the grounds, the bar tenders, the restaurants, the entertainment teams. they are all very kind and run the resort very smooth. lets not forget the cart runners, room service, I could go on an on.  If you want calm and quiet, there are places for that as well/  we really enjoyed the shows, the music and the pool fun, oh the pool fun was the best part of the daytime activities.  we will be back and stay longer next time. Dora was a pleasure by the pool to make sure everyone was having a great time, and the Bartenders work so fast without stopping.  I honestly cannot complement them all enough.  The food was fantastic, the atmosphere was romantic, and the time there will forever be in my

One of the best resorts we've stayed at. From the moment you check in to when you check out, the staff are on point. The churros and food truck by the pool, soooo good! Special shout out to Sonia at the bar. She was my girl! Issac at the buffet was amazing as well. Thank You for making my BIRTHDAY memorable. We will be back.

This is a unique resort since it has vegetation everywhere and the buildings are built in the jungle. The pools are very clean and the beach is wide and the sand is white. The food is average but the French restaurant is a standout for taste and service. The staff is very friendly and hard working.

It's a nice place with the nicest employees you will ever meet.  We are returning guests and celebrating our 40th anniversary.  They never acknowledged either, which surprised me.  I think I lost 10lbs, in a week.  I absolutely hated the dinner restaurants.  They really need a buffet option.  It was too gourmetish for me.  I couldn't get anything plain.  Everything had sauce on it.  And breakfast and lunch buffet was exactly the same every single day.  We leave on Saturday and I can't wait to get home.

Six of us celebrating milestone anniversaries had an incredible time at VIM!  From the food, the pools, the grounds, the rooms, and especially the people, everything exceeded our expectations. Shout outs to Dora (mi amor!) for always checking on us and bringing a smile, Miguel and Lucia at the main pool for keeping us hydrated, and Fabiola at the French restaurant for her awesome service.  Don't hesitate to booking this amazing place.  We will be back!

Great place for a couples trip. Please know that this review is for our stay with consideration given to price point, obviously there are more luxurious hotels in the Cancun/RM area but with higher cost.  The swim up bar was fun and the nightlife was good for a 30+ crowd. We did not spend much time at the beach but it looked great.  The food was fine, slightly better than Riu but not much more.   We spent most of our time in the main pool area and swim up bar. Played a lot of pool volleyball.  The rooms were good, about what is expected for the price point ($500-$600/night for double occupancy). The resort isn't too big but they still had plentiful golf carts around if you don't like to walk.   The staff was all very friendly and greatly enhanced our stay. The transfer was

This was my 16th visit to the Valentin.  This time, I went with my sister to celebrate her birthday.  Everything was fantastic, as always!  As it was my sister's birthday, they had a towel cake waiting on the bed when we got to our room on the first day.  This attention made her very happy!   We had booked the Privé Package and were very happy we did.  Just having our Bali bed reserved at the beach every day was worth it!  A big thank you to Mariela at the Privé lounge for her excellent service!  The restaurants were all very good.  As the last time I was there before this visit was 3 years ago, I was pleased to see that they added an a la carte option for breakfast and lunch.  We only tried the lunch and it was very good!  Awesome options such as spring rolls, deep fried whole

Absolutely beautiful, amazing service, and great value. The best resort I have ever visited, and each staff member went out of their way to make it a wonderful experience. This resort had it all, highly recommend!

This was our 4th trip to the resort and couldn't be happier!  Everyone who works there is wonderful especially Dora!  She always makes you feel welcome and at home!  Antonio by the main pool is fantastic along with Miguelle, Albino, and Manuel!  We will definitely be back!

Gorgeous place absolutely the best! We wouldn’t change this places for any other , The staff is amazing! The food is the best 10 out of 10 this is our third year and will continue to come next year hopefully with our daughter, the staff goes beyond to cater for you always ready to help, dora such a wonderful person very helpful and fun to talk to

We have visited the Cancun region for over 30 years, and Valentin is the best resort we have stayed at in Quinta Roo! This was our 4th time and we loved it more than ever. The beach was amazing and we got to swim in the ocean every day. The grounds are very spacious and you feel like you are in the jungle. Even though it was 96% booked, we never felt too crowded, as there is so much space between pools and the beach. The restaurants are top notch and offer a wide variety of dishes and the service is exceptional! The staff at the Valentin are wonderful! They really do make you feel at home! Our favorites are Dora Inglés Ibenez and Oscar at the Mar restaurant! Dora is a hospitality manager who always takes time to talk to us and answer our many questions. Oscar treated us like

The resort is beatiful and vast with an immaculately kept jungle theme, when we were there the VIM it was at 94% capacity, but at no point did it ever feel crowded. We stayed in room 5314, highly recommended with both a sea and pool view. The pool was a 30 second stroll and the beach, maybe a couple of minutes. The restaurants were no more than a 3-5 minute stroll, perfect.   The sports bar is currently closed, not an issue for us; Don Miguel's, where we went every night is open until 11pm but then you have the square which has live entertainment and a bar until 1am, the coffee shop is also open until 1am, which has a lot of different goodies, their ice cream is addictive.  The restaurants were great, the French, Mexican, Surf & Turf, and Indonesian were our favourite, and

We love VIRM so much that this is our third time there. The staff and the attention to detail is what keeps bringing us back. From the check-in, housekeeping, restaurant servers, cooks, bartenders, gardeners, maintenance, all the way to check-out, ALL staff is amazing and goes above and beyond. I feel spoiled and pampered every time I come back. A big shoutout to ANGELES in the main pool- she is the best! She had my drink ready as soon as she'd see me arrive at the pool. Another special shout-out to Luis and Jesus in Le Marche breakfast and lunch buffet. I feel right at home when they are helping us enjoy our meal. These 3 individuals have been here all three times that we came to VIRM and honestly, they are the reason we keep coming back.   However, this time around, I did

This was my wife and I's 6th time at this resort and even though it was our shortest trip it was still absolutely amazing! The staff is top notch and do everything they can to make sure you are well taken care of. Our favorite people are Edgar, Jorge, Pablo (dive center), and of course the wonderful Dora! They go above and beyond to make sure we have an amazing experience every time we step foot onto the grounds! The food is absolutely amazing! With one of the largest pools in Mexico and a huge beach this place has everything for everyone!

The Valentin Imperial is the absolute best resort I have ever stayed at. They are all so happy that you are there, and they have events that you can take part in every hour of the day. The food was great and the employees ( especially A team) were even better!!

We Love this resort so much, we refuse to go anywhere else because we are afraid we will be disappointed with other places compared to VIM! The attention to every detail is second to none in the service of everything from room service; breakfast, lunch, and dinner; the beach and pool bars; even the staff knowing you by name! We hadn't been back in 2 years and alot of the waiters at the restaurants and bars still knew us by name when we came back this trip. That is when you know there is something special. Dora always makes you feel welcome with a sweet smile and the best conversations. She's so wonderful! Jorge is our favorite server and makes sure we are always taken care of for breakfast and lunch. Edgar is a true rockstar and makes sure every detail is taken care of to make

My five brothers, our wives, and our mother had a wonderful week at the Valentin.  The food in the restaurants is exceptional, service is amazing, the setting is so beautiful.  We particularly loved Miguel who served us food and drinks while we lounged by the pool and visited.  He was quick with a smile and service!  Thank you, Miguel!  We were also impressed with Dora who we remembered from a trip taken 6 years prior.  She greeted and chatted with us by the pool.  It was great to catch up!  Thank you to all of the staff for their courtesy and service!  It was a great trip!  Highly recommend!

If you are an exotic travelers member—this review is for you! We have been to most of the Karisma resorts over the last 12 years and are always impressed with the attention to detail and amazing food. We've been hearing about the Nickelodeon resort for years and was really looking forward to going since we now have young kids. Originally, we were going to stay at this resort for our visit this summer, but after reading the reviews here on Tripadvisor and doing a day visit, I feel like we dodged a bullet. If you are used to other resorts, including the El Dorado Royale, Generations, Azul, or Maroma, this resort majorly lacks the quality food, service, and care for its members and visitors. We decided to stay in Generations (amazing!!) and do a day trip to Nickelodeon water park

Overall, we had the best family vacation EVER here!  The water park was EVERYTHING!!! My son loved everything about this place. I liked that it was new and still clean, but there were some things that I did not like.  CONS: Don't even think about arriving early. We sat in the lobby for 5 hours waiting on our room and it still wasn't ready until well after 4 pm.  The beach is not swimmable, I knew this going in, but I took a look at it myself and it was awful.  I like the concept of the infinity pools at each room, but they don't clean the pools, so ours was filthy. It contained dead bugs, bird poop, and food.  The water was cool but not unbearable, I just tried not to look at the dirty water when I got in.  The majority of the food was not good.  I had three different dishes at

I would NOT recommended this hotel! They falsely charged my credit card for $476 the day of my check out.  When I called to confront them, it was almost impossible to reach the hotel by phone directly. The two times that I finally got through, I would get disconnected after explaining my reason for calling. I disputed the charge with my credit card company, they finally refunded me after sending much evidence of trying to contact them via phone & multiple emails. The hotel had 30 days to dispute my complaint. They did on last day with false written  receipts saying that I purchased a jacket & a windbreaker on day of check out. They also said that I did not check out at front desk which is a false accusation too! I’m sure video cameras could prove that I did at the check out

We enjoyed our stay although we think there could be more activities at different times so we could be in all of them and more characters as well. We loved that the rooms have private pools! Our kids loved aqua nick!  Team nick is really awesome they all had a great attitude and they are all very polite Luna and Emiliano were giving us information about the activities and stuff to do and they were very polite with us all the time!  We’re definitely thinking about coming back

The food and the service it's great. Geni and Brian was super kind and nice to our girls and us. We can't wait ti come back. Strongly recomend. The drinks and tacos!!! We don't mind the extra calories at all

I checked in today, August 1st 2022 for one night as I am a foreigner living in Cancun and was visiting a friend that is staying at the resort.   BTW..do not use google maps to take you to this resort. Google maps will take you to playa del carmen which is 24 KM away from where the hotel actually is.   First, if you are visiting and are thinking of beautiful blue water and white sandy beaches. This is DEFF not it. The water is brown (as it is seaweed season) and even if it wasn't there is huge cement blocks in the water and nothing to sit on in the sand.  The waterpark is really nice, it offers slides for all ages. My daughter is 9 but very petite and was allowed to go on the bigger slides that involve a mat but not on the other slides that involve tubes so that was annoying.

I have been trying to reach out to this place for 2 weeks now regarding my upcoming stay in November. It’s so frustrating to pay all this money for somewhere and no communication. I even reached out to prestige travelers but they were unable to help.

Did not enjoy this hotel took well over 1.5 hrs just to check in then when we walked ten minutes to find room key cards would not work. Food was not good and same thing every day. Restaurants are not much better. Always seem to be queuing at bars never enough staff. Some of the staff where very rude. Hotel is just to far away from everything and at least £40 to go back and forth. For me Hotel was a massive let down and definitely not 5 star

We traveled in October 2022 with my 6m old baby girl.  What we liked: -The hotel has a modern architecture /vibe. We stayed in a swimp up King suite - ocen view, in the 5th floor. The room has a large space and it is very nickelodeon-aesthetic. -The main lobby was always clean and it is beautiful. -The Aqua Nick park is really awesome, clean and well maintained. My baby had a lot of fun! -I really appreciated the fact that they had baby food in the buffet (Heinz) , and it is overall a baby friendly hotel. If requested, they provide cribs, bottle warmers, etc. -We had a private slime experience also really nice :) -Meet and greet with characters very well organized. -Room service was great, didn't took so long and I really appreciated the hot coffee and desserts. -Friendly staff

I just paid for the water park at Hotel Nickelodeon, and its kind of expensive but our son enjoyed a lot. Not recommend the slime, as it feels kind of sticky. Our concierge Alex Cañizales was extremely helpful, giving excellent recommendations.  Next time I would definitely try staying at the hotel.

My family and I stayed for 4 nights and I wasn’t impressed with the service of the staff or the hotel itself. I have stayed at much better family resorts in Mexico. The water park is great and there are a lot of character picture opportunities which is great. We almost missed our tour because they didn’t let us out of the hotel which made us feel very insecure and Edith in front desk did nothing to help us or make us feel better.

Honestly I didn’t really like the Nickelodeon resort as much as I thought I would or for being as expensive as it was. I probably would have left sooner if we hadn’t met Alejandro Cañizales Espinosa the concierge. He made our stay so much better, telling us where to go, sending me the itinerary every morning, scheduling excursions and making & adjusting reservations. He even located my daughters lovie that she left in the suv that brought us to the hotel. The water park is fun but they need more servers they were so over worked. 3 people got food poisoning when we were there from their food & I don’t recommend ordering a birthday cake (It’s not as good as an American cake). But Alex helped us do that as well, last minute we put a birthday party together. They really don’t have

It is a great experience for the whole family. It is the third time that I spend my vacations in this hotel and all have been great, the water park is very fun and the rooms are extremely comfortable, the food is great and the attention is the best, the night shows are a great attraction and living with Nickelodeon characters is the best

We travelled as a family of 5 and anticipated to have a great time away, however, it was not only great, it was absolutely amazing!   From the exceptional service to the resort and water park, there is much to do. While we stayed on the resort and enjoyed the amenities, we also did a few day trips.   One area of excellence was the event team at the water park lead by Zeus and Fernanda. From our initial walk into the water park these two formed a special bond with our kids and ensured they were included in all activities and events at the water park. They were genuine and wonderful people, from water play to beach volleyball (Max from the team was great as well).   Special shout out to Zeus, Fernanda and Max from the event team that left a special memory in our hearts.   All the

We just returned from our stay and WOW we did not know what to expect being a family of adults, but the resort did not disappoint! It is the perfect marriage of what seems like amazing fun for kids and  sophisticated luxury for adults. Delicious drinks and food, beautiful rooms and every single one has a swim-up pool on the balcony. Everywhere we went there was something that made us go "wow", whether it was an ice cream cart during lunch, the crazy fun REAL waterslides, the rock wall to climb in the pool, the decorations in the drinks, the turn down service...   Big shout out to the STAFF, from the life guards ensuring everyone's safety to the bar and wait staff to the maids. So polite, friendly, and professional. The best of the best is right here!

Great new facilities, great water park and events for the entire family.   Staff gave 110% to make our experiance amazing and memorable.   Thank you Giovanni Carlos and Aideli for your services. You are truely an amazing crew.   Food services were amazing. Great eating out and Keanu’s great food service great mini bar service great on site facilities. Perfect water park for all ages young and old alike.  If you have a family and like resorts this is a must try life experience.    Staff very friendly across their entire facility very professional.   Thank you all who helped give us one of the most enjoyable memories and positive lfe experiences.

5 stars all the way around!!! We stayed at Generations & as members were able to get night passes to have dinner & hang out for evening entertainment. We also paid extra for a day pass to the water park. Everything was amazing!! Shout outs to the following staff for making our trip extra fun:  Member concierge - Stephanie Butlers - Aideli, Claire, Estefanie Waterpark butler - Chepo Waterpark bartender - Candelario (ask for the Feliz Navidad) Snick Bartender - Israel  Thank you all & happy holidays!!

This resort by far surpassed my expectations.  I was impressed with all the attention to detail throughout the resort.  The best part was the staff who went above and beyond, I wish I got more names bc everyone we encountered was awesome!  The waterpark area is where we spent 3 of our 5 days and there was never a dull moment.  This is where we met the best Team Nick employees ever.  Michelle was over all the games and my daughter loved playing all the games.  Then there was Zues and Ferny who went above and beyond to interact with the children.  They made a lasting impression on my daughter and us as well.  I couldn't have asked for a better experience and we will be back!! Every restaurant on the resort was good and accommodating for our party of 8.  The shuttles that go back

Nickelodeon Resort was incredible - cleanest and most well kept resort ever visited and an incredible team that truly makes you feel like family.  From Omar, Lino, Arturo in the Spatula to JZ, Irving, Andrew at the pool and beyond.

Expend one week in nickelodeon  , was awesome  all the activities  and serve , Andy and Cristian  of team sports . Marie and angel dj   of team nickelodeon  , the restaurants  were so good thanks for everything

My family could not have enjoyed our time here any more.  Incredible family friendly setting and great team of people.    Cristian and Max - Sports Staff-  were awesome to hang out with in the snick lounge.   Luisa- Personal concierge- was tremendous.    Alexis- Good Burger- was incredibly attentive and memorized our orders and drinks.

Wow! They thought of everything! First off, let me just say we're a family of 5 with a 7, 5, 2 year old that loves to travel! We've been to nickelodeon Punta Cana and beaches turks and caicos ( which we love!!) And nickelodeon riviera Maya was incredible! The staff was so welcoming and helpful. We rarely got a "no" to any request ( and there were many) the hotel was designed with kids in mind, for example every bathroom has step stools!!! This is huge to let kids frequently wash hands independently! Every room also has a plunge pool on the balcony in which there is the balcony door and then another half door that let's you feel the breeze and safely keep kids in the room and out of the pool I'd parents are too busy to watch them. Also the staff was so considerate , when my son

My family and I had an amazing time at Nickelodeon Riviera Maya! Before our trip, we communicated via email with our concierge Leonardo Rodriguez who did an amazing job preparing us for our stay. He was also very helpful, kind, pleasant and genuinely caring during our entire stay. The rooms are beautiful. We enjoyed the water park with our children and the kids were busy and enjoyed a relaxing day at the spa. The food was okay, not that great but Piazza and Bikini bottom were the ones that we were able to enjoy somewhat. We celebrated our baby's first birthday as well. The sponge bob cake was top tier and beautiful. The resort prepared a beautiful balloon arrangement for our baby boy as well. We will remember this trip for years to come.

Cannot beat the service here! Brayan, Pablo, Juan,  and Jesus have been outstanding servers for us while at the water park. Just fantastic! So cool, so friendly, all good!  I can't say enough good things about Team Nick and the especially awesome team of Zeus, Max, Cristian, Ferny, and Andi! They have 100% made this place amazing! They are so great! Beautiful resort with too many positive things to list: many pools, beautiful beach, high quality food and drinks. However, the service needs attention. I had multiple bad experiences. For example, reserving a dining option for 4 people was very challenging. After waiting in concierge line for 25 minutes, the concierge young lady was short and rude. Basically sue said there are no options for today. Without offering to look for another day. When I asked her to look for the next stay, she seemed annoyed and again her response was short “there’s nothing for tomorrow as well”. Same response attempting for a third day. It gets worst, another family we were still went to the concierge desk despite we shared there are no reservations, and somehow for reservations for 3 STRAIGHT days.

Alejandro was an amazing server. Great attention to detail and very charismatic. We had great conversation with him and he kept the wine flowing! The menu is very extensive, with great options for vegetarians and pescatarians. The gelato was a great way to finish the meal. Everything came quickly, could not ask for a better experience!

We have just had our 2nd anniversary staying at Paradisus Playa Del Carmen. We have had the most amazing stay here all servers where pleasant and always happy to help.   Our stay was made very special by Eduardo Hernández from Guest Service.  He made all of our reservations and also really good suggestions for our anniversary.  He could not of done any more to make our stay special.

The property is gorgeous and the Nikte concierge was incredible (we had Cynthia).  The Master Nikte Swim Up Suite on the family side was absolutely beautiful.  Pools, bars, beach - Incredible.  The food was eh.  By the 8th day I was ready to get home just because of the food.  Also, they find ways to make you feel like you earned a night at the "Fancy" steakhouse, Sals, whether included for a night because you upgraded to Nikte or if you sit through the rewards presentation....either way, whatever you do, do not spend money on Sals if it's not being offered free.  When you get there they tell you that the house favorite is the NY Strip entree.  It's funny because it is conveniently priced the most (of course it's free so not to worry).  So you go ahead and order the most

The resort itself was beautiful, but their Nikte concierge service was definitely not worth it.  They sell their Nikte experience as a stress free way to get the most out of your stay.  They will book all dinner reservations and help you with anything else you might need during your stay.  We arrived on Saturday, and did not hear from our concierge until Tuesday.  By that time, I had made my own dinner reservations, because my family was tired of eating at the buffet for the first three nights.  I talked to multiple people on Sunday and Monday about our concierge, but they kept pushing us to another person, until I finally found my way to the concierge desk.  Even after our concierge made contact three days late, he did nothing to improve the situation.  Anytime we reached out

Our family had an amazing vacation at Paradisus! The swim up suite was perfect for our family of five! All of the staff members were very pleasant and helpful, especially our personal concierge, Eduardo Gamboa. He communicated with us daily and made sure we had everything we needed to make our stay more enjoyable. He even left daily surprises for our kids, which made their stay very memorable! Thanks, Eduardo!  The Valdez Family

A lot of food. But all garbage. People say good food, but it only for people who eat all kinds of crap. Restaurants are available for 9:30 pm from day 1 to day 5. Dont waste your money. Ocean dirty crap

In a lot of ways, this resort is geared towards families. There is a kids pool, water part, and a kids club. There are also a lot of wild animals roaming the property, mostly coatis and spider monkeys. The staff makes no effort to chase animals away from hotel grounds.  The problem with wild animals and kids is that... Soon enough, your young kids will try to interact with these wild animals. That can end badly, and so it did. My 5-year old son was bit by a coati on hotel grounds. Luckily, nothing serious (but it could be, as they can carry diseases and parasites). A doctor saw us in our room, which cost us almost 250 USD (200 for visit, 38 for some antibacterial cream). I asked the hotel rep if they could cover this, at least partially, but was told they won't do that. Instead,

The restaurant (La Palapa) is absolutely amazing.  The manager (Esparanza) and staff (Mr. Renau and Ms. Citlalli) make you feel right at home with their service.  The food is great and their attitudes, service, and attention to detail make this food venue a repeat attraction.  We ate breakfast or lunch there at least 4 times that week.  If you stay at Paradisus  Playa del Carmen, I highly recommend that you check them out!!   Thank you again Ms. Esparanza, Ms. Citlalli, and Mr. Renau.

We had an amazing time at the Paradisus. Our children aged 10,9,7 loved it as well.   The service was amazing everywhere you went. We booked our own reservations early on in the trip for the entire week and had no issues with any times as they book up early. We ate at all the restaurants where kids were allowed they were great! Hibachi and Capella were our favourites. The buffet was just OK compared to the restaurants.   Guest services was amazing! They upgraded our room and our kids loved all the activities provided.    Every worker at the hotel is so nice and welcoming.   The drink selection is next level! Alcohol selection that is included would be considered an upgrade at other resorts was included here.   We had a blast and would recommend going.

Cesar was great! We stayed at the Alberca Celsius. He treated us really good. Me and my family are really happy with Cesar services. Cesar is a really nice guy. If we return to Paradisus we would love to have Cesar as our butler again.

My family just returned from our holiday and it was the perfect resort for visiting with our 5 year old. THANK YOU to our concierge Jorge - he was responsive to all our needs and super professional. He went above & beyond to make sure we had whatever we needed. The resort has multiple pools, restaurants and overall the food was great. Our enjoyed visiting the kids club each day and we all enjoyed the water park. My husband and I both had two massages at the spa during our seven day trip. They were the best massages! We hope to visit again!

This was our second time at the resort, 1st time was 2 years ago. We were so impressed by the overall experience that we decided to return back this year with the same expectations. I have to say, we were a bit disappointed this year. I’m not sure if it was because it was overcrowded, we normally travel during our kids fall break in October. This year, the water was dirty, I understand that’s not on the resort. Also, the food quantity was not the same as the other year we stayed. It wasn’t good at all, especially the buffet. Reservations at the restaurants were very limited, time wise and we tried making reservations the day we got there. Having small kids that can’t stay awake past 9 was hard to make work, so we spent most of our time at the buffet. Again, it was not good.  The

The resort is beautiful. But we had issues with every experience we tried to do. At first the concierge called and asked to meet with us for breakfast to give us information about the resort. He then pawned us off on a representative for the endless conversation about the time share that was definitely not a time share. The man we spoke with was rude and aggressive. Once he started talking money he would only address my husband. He told my husband my family and I was so thankful for him giving us this vacation. I am a women and I have a very good job and contribute a lot financially to my family. His behavior was sexiest and insulting.  I was promised a free massage for attending this talk. It took three days and multiple conversations to get the certificate. I did receive it

Still staying there and really love the service and quality of food and drinks.   But the bay itself is infested with seaweed. I am aware the seaweed is all over the Caribbean. But this particular bay get even more due to currents. Otherwise a lovely place that I would always recommend

Everyone who worked here was so helpful and welcoming. 10/10 experience. It was such a great time. The pool and beach and all activities are fabulous. All restaurants were delicious. The staff are so kind and helpful.

Service was good however one bad blemish was at the Aqua restaurant. Overall the staff and pool side service is incredibly polite, helpful and attentive to guests needs. Our concierge Jorge is amazing. He catered to all our needs and went above and beyond to ensure our stay was enjoyable.

The 8:00AM yoga was so relaxing, but a great way to get an early sweat in. The instructor was great at giving bilingual instructions and corrections to certain poses. Highly recommend! We will be coming back tomorrow AM.

My fiancé, now husband got married at Paradisus in July 2023. And it was the most beautiful & romantic wedding. Denys Madrigal was our wedding planner and was there with us throughout every step of the way. We have been to the Paradisus concept in Cancun a couple times & wanted to give our friends & family the chance to enjoy it as we have in the past! It was all a success! We specifically wanted no kids at our wedding, & because Paradisus, Playa De Carmen offered an adults side only, this really gave us what we were wanting.

We celebrated  our last night at Cielo restaurant at Pradisus Palaya del carmen, it was wonderful experience. Manuel Torres attended us, it was our special moment and they made it more special, he recommended us very nice dishes basis our likings and disliking, he was too good with kids and kids meals recommendations. Apptizers, drinks, main course and Desert everything was awesome and figure licking food. I must recommended everyone to try this restaurant if you love Mexican food and a good place to try if you are new to Mexican Cusine.

This was a wonderful trip!! The scenery and design is beautiful and the staff members are very friendly and helpful with anything you need. Shout out to Juan, Cesar, Angel, Osiris, and Agustin for providing exceptional service throughout this trip, they really went above and beyond to make this a great experience. Highly recommend checking out this resort with your friends and family!

It’s our 3rd experience at Paradisus' resorts  -two in Mexico and one in Dominican Rep- always including concierge services as we have two kids. We never regret booking at Paradisus; quality and cleanliness are guaranteed. It’s our default choice for all-inclusive vacations. This last experience was different in a positive way; that positive gap was made with one person, our concierge, Jonathan Vergara. Jonathan was always one step ahead of your needs, willing to help you quickly and efficiently address any request. As a rule of thumb, we don’t go to the same place twice, but this experience at Playa del Carmen with Jonathan trigger us to rethink our rule. I will ask the resort to assign Jonathan for future booking at Paradisus Playa del Carmen.  C.

Paradisus playa del Carmen exceeded my expectations in every way. Our check in was so smooth and fast and easy. Raul was so helpful in getting our bags to our room and even helped us get an upgraded room at a very reasonable rate. We received a personal concierge who messaged us on what’s app, and sent us everything we wanted. She met us at the pool so our kids could play while we learned about all the resort had to offer. She arranged an excursions agent to meet us there as well. We had continual support through what’s app even at night. The food was awesome. Our favorite restaurants were mole, and then probably capella, but all of it was good. Room service was good and on time. Our concierge Tiara, even created a bubble bath with balloons and Cookie Monster cupcakes and

Pretty decent place, good selection of restaurants & great pool selection, especially for kids. Roberto López at the Sunrise snack bar was beyond amazing. Took care of all of our drinks & food needs all week long and was very attentive.

We had a great time. Great facilities, accomodations,great food however some of the restaurants/bar staff could be more courteous . The entertainment team was very good, specially Leslie who encouraged us to participate in the activities.

Moises and Ricky were absolutely amazing servers!!! They made my dinner really personal and inviting.  Food was 10/10.  Makes sure drink are always full, and they give great recommendations.  I definitely recommend this restaurant

We came here in a wedding trip, we had a blast, everything is so nice, staff are special, Leslie the new entertainment staff gave us a yoga class today and she was so profesional, we loved also her aquagym, honestly we really like everything of the resort

Service was great! Specially from our concierge Eduardo! Really made the stay special for the whole family. Hotel is clean and pools are awesome. Our 4 year old and 2 year old really enjoyed the water park. Food is ok overall. After day 4 it starts to repeat itself. Beach was better than expected.

Service was great and hotel is pretty cool. Pools are clean. All staff are friendly. Drinks are great. Alfonso from Sunrise restaurant is awesome. Jazmin from Club Melia is awesome. Ginsey from Sunrise restaurant is great. Experience is great. We will be back again.

This resort sets the bar of all resorts in the area. We like to stay at different spots in Cancun area when we visit (multiple times a year) and this place is somewhere we will return again and again. Amazing food, top notch service and some of the best entertainment. Will be back!

We were served by Marisa and Iris at the Water Park, and they are very professional in their jobs, the attention to the client was very good, my family are so happy with them. The attention with the kids exceptional.

We enjoyed our visit to Paradisus.  The staff made our trip even more memorable.  They are friendly and attentive!  Our favorite poolside waiter is Alfonso Guirda, from the Sunrise restaurant Celsius.  He took excellent care of us.  Always with a smile and a welcoming word.   Thank you!

We have taken several trips to Paradisus Playa Del Carmen, this was our first trip post-pandemic. We have always done Family Concierge (Reserve), and always booked a swim-out suite, but this time we booked under Nikte, since FC is no longer available.  We love this resort!  There were some things that have improved since our last trip, but also some things that were less impressive.  The good: For the first time we got connecting rooms - and that was amazing, especially since we had asked in the past.  This made traveling with a group of 4 children aged 9-18 much more enjoyable!  The beach was cleaner from times we have visited in the past, although sargassum is still an issue.  The check in was faster than I remember.  And a big improvement is that we weren't dodging timeshare

The hotel is beautiful. The rooms are definitely 5 stars with comfortable beds, nice bathroom, and very nice tubs. It doesn’t seem to have enough pools because they were always crowded. The water park is very nice for its size, and the fact that they offer drinks and have a restaurant for snacks and ice cream is great. The Nespresso place is open 24 hours. The ice cream stand offers plenty of delicious flavors. The Buffet restaurant offers many choices and if you go early for each meal, the food is hot and tasty. The other restaurants are small, so you have to make reservations, and they cannot accommodate everyone. The best restaurants that we were able to try were the Italian restaurant Capella (delicious food and wine, and great service), and Lunch Box ( the guacamole,

Moises from MOLE restaurant was excellent. Polite and extremely accommodating as I was dining with two small children and 2 drunks (my oldest daughter and my husband). Moises made my time at Mole wonderful, and made us feel welcome regardless of our circumstances. Thank you Moises.

We spent 7 days on the Nikte side with our two children 6 and 10. Our concierge Carlos Adrian Bosquez was wonderful! We were so happy and blessed to have him. Every day when we came back to the room there was a little surprise waiting for the kids and sometimes for us adults as well! He always had a smile and seemed genuinely happy to see us.  We arrived at the hotel around noon and much to our surprise they had our room ready and waiting for us. We had listed a few requests prior to arrival, and all were fulfilled. We had a one-bedroom suite, and it was huge, comfortable, and more importantly, quiet! The whole week we spent there; we didn’t hear any noise from anywhere. This was important to us, since last year we were at a different resort and the halls were always noisy with

The overall review is average, due to poor customer service when things are requested. The front desk always wanted their way which is not the reason while someone comes for the vacation. The only of the resort that's good is restaurant service.

Thanks so much Carlos and Noemi. Your are both exceptional!!! The servir you provided us with made it worth. The food was fenomenal and I certainly highly suggest this restaurant to everyone. You will love it! Ask to try all of the appetizers.

We had a fabulous experience at Banyan Tree.  The service, food, and setting were all spectacular.  The beach was beautiful and the pool / beach area had plenty of seating.  The spa was wonderful as well.

Dulce, one of the spa therapists at the Banyan Tree, Mayakoba, hands down gave me the most effective massage of my llife really relieving the tension in my neck and shoulders. 120percent recommend this lady if you are lucky enough to be able to get her.

Excellent experience. The attention from the staff is exactly what one would hope at a five star hotel. Always available, always polite and amiable, never intrusive. There are several restaurants on site that are all excellent - Saffron was a favorite, but all were great. Portions are generous, so consider sharing plates. The spa offers quite a variety of options. Morning yoga was fantastic. The rooms are beautiful and comfortable. We were upgraded to a beach room, but honestly all looked great. The campus is quite large, but bikes are available at all rooms and a golf cart-type shuttle is just a call away. Would absolutely recommend. Oh, and there's a golf course. We don't play golf, but it seemed nice.

This is an amazing resort.  We had a Beachfront Terrace Pool Suite, so we were right on the beach, with a large patio with plenty of comfortable furniture as well as our own small pool.  Each day the staff would set up our beach chairs on the sand just outside our room, with towels, umbrella, and bottled water.  The bathroom was quite large, with a jacuzzi tub and shower outside it.  It was a very comfortable room, and we ordered room service a few times and sat outside enjoying the view.  The staff was genuinely nice and very warm and helpful.  We called for a ride to the main lobby many times and never had trouble getting one in a timely manner.  The resort did not feel crowded, and I don't know if it was a slow week (just after New Years) or if it always feels that way.  We

My husband and I spent 4 nights at the Banyan Tree and had the most amazing experience.  From the minute we arrived on the property the service and attention to detail was second to none.  Emmanuel and Paola were our personal concierge during our stay and were extremely attentive to our every need.  The property, service, spa and food were all top notch!  We can not wait to return

We had tons of fun riding the bike to the beach. Our best meal was at tomahawk’s steakhouse.  @Chef Alfonso De La Dehesa made us feel at home. I was hesitant to order the wagyu steak, but Chef Alfonso recommended it and it did not disappoint. My wife ordered the seabass ,which was cooked to perfection. We paired our meal with a dry, light-to-medium-bodied Pinot Noir. We closed the evening with a decadent 4-layer chocolate cake. Service was outstanding. Truly a night to remember.

We had a blast of time in "A chance to Meat 2023" as we have always had in Mayakoba events. Perfect place, superb food & great service are always guaranteed.  You just need good quality of friends and its a memorable night.

Beautiful resort with an amazing staff.  They made us feel right at home from day one and continued to be extremally accommodating throughout our entire stay.  I would definitely recommend and we will definitely be back.  Thank you!

My wife (ahh! My wife!) and I went to Banyan Tree for our honeymoon for 6 nights. We have had an incredible time. Standouts in no particular order: * Doria as a kayaking tour guide was so wonderful. She is so well-informed about the area and the ecology and biology of the jungle and lagoon.  * Johnny, Marco, Omar as the waiters at breakfast were so great and lovely to speak with each morning. Edna and Alin, the hostesses, were so sweet and accommodating as well.  * Speaking of breakfast, we had a breakfast buffet included in our stay and it puts all other breakfast buffets to shame. This isn’t the average breakfast. I got to have smoked fish, fruit, fresh green juice, birria, and endless mimosas every morning. * Yoly and Sandra were our masseuses for our couples massage and it

My wife and I honeymooned at Banyan Tree Mayakoba and couldn't have had a more beautiful, restful stay. The daily spread and friendly service (shoutouts to Jhonny, Marco, and Omar) started each morning off on a cheery foot - don’t miss it! Kayaking with Doria was one of the coolest tours I’ve ever been on, and the boat tour of the lagoon that you don’t have to personally power took the other half of the cake. Yoly and Sandra put us to sleep with their massage technique, making that trip to the spa well worth its while. Stay here!

Incredible location, helpful staff, unique experiences.  We enjoyed the individual villa rooms with a pool, a nice treat for an everyday dip. The bikes were fun to roam the property and had a chance to see wildlife and enjoy the kayaking and sailing.  Breakfast buffet was well done and the restaurants were fantastic.  Would stay here again.

Amazing environnement within the Mayakoba area. Impressive amenities even though the villas may need a bit of renovation works (missing tiles in the swimming pool, some traces of humidity on the walls, non working toilet flush). Many restaurants are available but the quality of food is disappointing (specially the Thai restaurant).

We were perfectly served while our group was there. We stayed longer and as soon as the rest of the group left, service dropped dramatically. Room was no longer cleaned correctly, amenities and mini bar were no longer replenished, and responsiveness of buggy staff decreased.

Banyan has been our favorite "second home" since 2010.  Celebrated special milestone bday celebration, NYE party as well as family get away for our past visits.  We have never been disappointed!  The staff is what makes this special place extra special. We were very excited to stay at the new Beachfront Lanai Pool Suite.  Absolutely amazing!  Andy & Laura took care of us during our week long stay.  Francisco from Sands made sure our beach chairs are always set up & was diligent in taking our requests from Sands. Work  from the government was being done on the beach but the Engineering staff & Director Angela  were absolutely fantastic explaining to us the beach rehabilitation.  Banyan has always been very eco conscious and we love this! Honestly, I cannot even think of an

Absolutely amazing stay! Yatzley and Eduardo made our trip seamless! From the special birthday surprise, organizing trips to the spa. I couldn’t recommend more.   Shout out to Karim at sands beach club; he went above and beyond to provide us with amazing cocktails!

Great trip to Banyan Tree Spa, we went twice!  My masseuse was Yoli and she was great!  Knowledgeable, good hands, good technique and very kind before and afterwards.  Would highly recommend the spa and Yoli!

Amazing from start to finish. I normally don’t write reviews but this place is worth my time. My spouse and I had been to many luxury resorts around the world and this one is at the top of the list. Worth every penny and we will be back. Both Villa ( we changed rooms midway) and Ocean front room were outstanding. Full privacy.  Food is NYC top restaurants level. Service is beyond excellent.  Gabrieli (I think that is his name) who served us at the beach (room 920 - we checked out May 24th 2023) and of course the beautiful nice lady who I forgot her name) who was on WhatsApp with us and always cared and offered her help. Thank you if you see this. She had the pink clothes working at Sands reception. They we both great and made our stay feel home.  Go visit. You’d be happy.

Wonderful experience and services. The evening beach BBQ experience was great and the food was amazing, although there was too much of it. Everything was clean and presentable. The beach itself was small, but this didn’t bother us as there was still plenty of places to lounge. They could use a few ocean toys other than kayaks, like paddle boards and snorkeling gear to use in the swim area.

Always a great experience coming to Banyan Tree Mayakoba!! The service is excellent, delicious food and beautiful scenery. This time we came for a wedding and everything was perfect. Their attention to detail is impeccable.

The hotel is just superb, nested deep in its natural green setting. Beautiful, spacious and comfortable rooms. Excellent service (Mexico at its best!) The food is ok but nothing to write home about. I have to mention we did not experiment the finest restaurant. Importantly and quite deceiving for a Mexican hotel, the margaritas were not good (probably quality of lime, too watery, and wrong proportions). Disappointed by the beach: because of the sargasos. This is a plague that affects almost all of the Riviera Maya. They had to install barriers at 200m from shore that effectively protect but ruin the beauty of the sea. In summary, go there to relax, enjoy the luxurious installations but don’t expect the dreamlike beaches that defined Riviera Maya 10 years ago.

Banyan tree was impeccable. From the landscapes, to the common area, to the rooms- there was not one blemish. Absolute perfection. The staff were all SO kind and friendly. They constantly check on you to make sure you need anything. Food was wonderful. We went for our honeymoon and the ocean front villa was the perfect room for a couples getaway. Highly recommend!!!

Excelent service, this place is a Paradise. All the staff is very help full. Emmanuel and his team makes thing easy and restaurants in the property are excelent. Spa service is top of the class…I hope we can come back soon. Thanks

Excelent Hotel. We stayed for our cousins wedding and it was astoninshing.  Perfect Hosts, perfect music, perfect service, perfect beach, perfect food and drinks. Not to leave out the pga course out of the comment... just excelent.

We loved our entire experience at Saffron in Banyan Tree Mayakoba! The setting is absolutely beautiful and peaceful surrounded by the natural beauty of the protected reserve.  We ordered the Mussel appetizer and grapefruit salad to start, flavors were spot on, complicated and so full of fresh flavor. My husband had the crispy shrimp entree… perfection! I had the vegetarian Massaman curry. They came with three different flavored rice bowls and naan.  You must visit if you are nearby, for the food and overall experience!

Wife and I are long time fans of Banyan Tree resorts, so we were excited to try the Banyan Tree in Mayakoba.  The resort met and exceeded expectations.  Staff attentive to every detail and made it very easy to navigate and coordinate all activities, both on and off campus.  A+ hospitality.  We will definitely be back and we will recommend it to others.

A to Z, the experience was superb.  From the grounds of the Mayakoba condominium, to the unbelievably well-appointed private villas, to the service throughout, the architecture, the maintenance, the cleanliness, and the sheer beauty of the resort, we are sure to come back!    A couple of notes.   Unlike what some other reviewers said, we experienced NO mosquitoes whatsoever. Given the high-touch level of service, guests should expect dozens of interactions with staff members, and the norm seems to be to tip each of them, so it is advisable to carry with you a bunch of local currency bills (50 pesos are roughly $3).

Everything, every part of staying at banyan tree was wholesome, rejuvenating and incredible.  The place is immaculate,  everyone I'd ready to serve you at any minute with whatever you need. Can't recommend it enough...

Beautiful property with fantastic service. Every staff member was well trained, knew our names and accommodated any and all requests.   The rooms are beautiful. They clean the beaches daily so there is no seaweed. The chairs are comfortable and the pool is wonderful.  It’s not cheap, especially for Mexico - but you get what you pay for. Played tennis ($20 to rent)

If you're looking for a very nice place to stay in the Playa, Cancun or Riveria Maya area, you can stop looking now. This is the place you need to go  Incredible staff who anticipates your every need. Amazing food, best I've had at any resort. A large area and plenty of activities and restaurants to choose from. The room we stayed in, was paradise.  A big thank you to the entire team and to Remco (Director of Rooms) for providing an unforgettable trip. Can't wait to go back soon!

This is an ultra luxury hotel that really goes out of the way to make you comfortable This is our second visit and they delivered again,  I would try the spa/massage - ask them for any specials, they had a two for one deal at 1 p.m.  The Massage was 60 min and 6 people enjoyed it. Also ask for the daily yoga and pilates class.  We had an issue with the A/C and they did everything to resolve it and in the end profusely apologized and gave us a discount and a very nice farewell gift.   Also don't miss the amazing buffet. Good food and  many choices ..

There aren’t enough superlatives to describe this resort but I’ll give it a try. We’ve been lucky enough to experience some amazing hotels and resorts on our travels over the years, but The Banyan Tree is exceptional imo. So many people work so hard to make this place special, but big shouts out to some of the many lovely people we’ve come across in the last six days. Firstly, the biggest thankyou to Remco - you know what you did and I hope you know how grateful we are. We so enjoyed talking and laughing with you - you are one really nice guy. At the beach and in Sands restaurant Marisol, Alan, Angel, Joel, Oscar, Miguel and all of the team were so attentive and kind. Also, the chefs did an amazing job at both breakfast and dinner  ( no doubt at lunch too but we never tried it )

This was our third visit to Banyan Tree Mayakoba and it was the best one! We stayed in the newly built beachfront lanai suite. Eduardo and Sonia at Concierge were very accommodating and Sandra and Diana showed the kids a great time at the kids club! Restaurants did not disappoint and the beachfront staff were there to make sure every need is met. We will definitely come back again.

The kids club by the beach at Bayan Tree made our holiday special. Our daughter Eva fell in love with Diana and Sandra. Watching them play with her was like leaving your daughter with two older sisters.  The activities were fun and engaging and Sandra went the extra mile to invite Eva to the Mexican Piñata night. Every morning Diana and Sandra greeted Eva with smiles and high fives and made her feel special. Other kids played and was great space to make friends and then play in the pool and beach with her new friends.   We spent 7 years going to fairmont mayakoba about twice a year as it felt more children friendly than Bayan tree but after Sandra and Diana’s efforts Bayan tree wins our business. Will be coming back mainly for the kids club.   Having said the wonderful parts of

Such a lovely long weekend for our first anniversary trip!   Andy and Sonia were so helpful in planning our week, such great suggestions and recommendations. We were spoiled with treats and little surprises the whole weekend!  The entire staff was so kind and the most hard working group of people we had ever met! Anything we could have possibly wanted, they made happen. Highly recommend. Ask for Oscar at breakfast, he makes the best lattes!

This was our best family vacation ever.  The service was second to none and hotel is both beautiful and immaculate.  Special shout out to Guadalupe and to Cesar who assisted us with kosher dining.  The food was excellent and both men were just fabulous.  We’ll be regular guests for sure.

Amazing staff, always willing to help and accommodate. Their attention to detail for our anniversary was excellent! The food was incredible. The fruit was delicious. The staff always treated us with hello’s

So to start, this place was absolutely beautiful! From the time you arrive, they give you 5 star treatment! They send you a survey to fill out before hand to ask a little about you and ask what you would like when you get there... they use this info to make your experience better. Our room was upgraded because we were there to celebrate our anniversary and it was our 1st time there. We were escorted by boat to the check in building,  and had drinks and a snack waiting for us. After check in we were shown to our room and baggage was delivered.  We were sent complimentary drinks and anniversary cake to our room to kick off the stay! The only constructive comment is that the villas and rooms are a little dated; requiring maintenance to compete with newer 5 star hotels. The rest is TOP NOTCH!

Banyan Tree is a wonderful, special place with a lot to be both celebrated and considered before booking.   Pros: The Staff - Anyone can spend money to make a beautiful hotel, but an incredible staff changes the entire experience. I believe that’s what makes it memorable at the end of the day. This place has figured it out. We have been fortunate to travel the world and this staff and service might be the best we’ve ever experienced. Diana, manager of the Tomahawk steakhouse went so far above and beyond to make my 7 year old son feel special that said “Daddy, can I pay to work with her?” Ricardo, Raul, Diamante, Santiago, and Edwin make the pools/beach something you’ll never forget. They are highly skilled cocktail makers with great energy and ability to connect with people.

The service was exceptional and the beach club was amazing! Highly recommend to anyone looking to go to Mayakoba. We had the in-villa dining and it was so yummy! The rooms are amazing and having a private pool was everything!

My wife and I had such a nice time. The resort is beautiful and the service is above and beyond. We had some issues with our room and Cecilia from the front office was kind enough to move us to a different room which was even more stunning and in a quieter area of the resort. Highly recommend!

The banyan tree is top notch. The service and employees are absolutely wonderful. And our kids LOVE the kids club. They can come and go as they please and it’s right by the beach. A beautiful resort, impecable service, delicious food, great accommodations. The private pool in every villa is a great plus. The room is very spacious and comfortable. Kids club is the best ever ! The two assistants are very personable and fun!! They have different activities - the piñata is a must; also pizza & cookies; recycled paper; arcade games are great. My son always looks forward to visiting them again !

Ignacio gave us a fun eco boat tour and let our son steer the boat. Get the meal plan so you can truly enjoy the food without the sticker shock. And breakfast buffet at the Oriente restaurant is a must. Minor issues that arose were handled proficiently by the staff.

We had such a wonderful time in Banyan Tree this past week. All of the staff at Mayakoba was fantastic, but Sandra at the Sands kids club went above and beyond. She was incredibly kind, accommodating, and professional. I can't thank her enough, she took our trip from lovely to unforgettable. We can't wait to go back next year.

Came for a 4 night stay and ended up extended two additional nights - enough said! The experience, aesthetic and hospitality is even better than expected. Will definitely be coming back for our next holiday!! Thank you, Banyan Tree Mayakoba.   **make sure to check out Saffron!!

Excellent time at the fairmont- all of the staff are wonderful. Nestor and Domingo from in room dining were so nice and surprised us with a bottle of champagne and a card for our anniversary.  We can’t wait to come back.

Gorgeous rooftop bar with a view! Servers went above and beyond to accommodate us. The bar had very comfortable seating (complete with fire pits) and the ability for large parties to spread out throughout the bar.

This is our second visit to Fairmont Mayakoba, and we got to fall in love with this place all over again. The hotel staff goes above and beyond to make your visit an unforgettable one. Can't wait to be back soon!

Was a bit skeptical choosing an all-inclusive option but we were blown away by the quality of food and the level of service at all the restaurants! A big shout-out to Tauro and its staff, the breakfast people especially Adalberto and also to Alajendro from Brisas!

My mom and I had the best experience at Fuego on the beach.  The food was divine.  The service was phenomenal.  Thank you German for making us feel at home.  And Aldo for one of the best meals we’ve ever had and introducing yourself to us.  We felt very special and we will be back next year!

We loved the hotel lobby. The Hix bar was great! Mariana and Raúl really made us feel like the number one priority. The food delivery and drink services were by far 5 star. Thank you Fairmont Mayakoba for the great staff and amazing experience!

I had an amazing time here in my visit. There service never changes. every time i come i bring my family and the enjoy the hotel and the people. I love to bring attention to my lovely server every morning I had. She is a doll and is soo darling to me and my family. I will Never forget Diana. The breakfast buffet at La Laguna was excellent as always. We enjoyed going to Brisas and Fuego for lunch as both restaurants had excellent sea food options. For solos, I do recommend requesting the tram to go to and from the lovely Mar di Olivo restaurant as it is quite a hike to go on your own at night. A second large yoga deck has been added since my last visit in December which allowed for more choices for yoga classes and many other interesting programming

Incredible experience all around. The grounds are magical, the service is attentive, and the beaches are gorgeous and clear! We loved riding around on the bikes to get to different areas of the hotel.  The path is soooo beautiful. We saw so much natural wildlife.   Su casa is where you eat breakfast on the beach and cozy romantic dinners in the evening. Amazing service, food, and atmosphere.   Honestly I cant speak highly enough of this place! Domingo was excellent at Ume and mars de olivio. He was very helpful and accommodating with our kids.   Su casa is our daily  for breakfast and lunch and view is peaceful and capture the Palmaia vibe.

This is the second time at palmaia with my family. Palmaia holds a special place in our heart. For me the best part are the  yoga classes. Ximena was so good! The resort is incredibly well taken care. Your every need/want is met. Highly recommend a suite with a meditation room!

Wonderful and truly relaxing.  Beautiful property with excellent (mostly vegan) food, friendly staff and interesting activities.  My husband and I felt it was the most rejuvenating vacation we've had in years! Definitely want to go back.

Avoid for a 5 stars wellness resort the spa is under renovation, they dont say it, prices for massages are about 450-500USD which is abusing they try to offer rebates but still way too much. Despite being all inclusive, decent wine was only avail for $$$ - roughly $70 for the cheapest Chardonnay.  Their free house white was just ok.

This room was supposed to be an upgrade and we paid an additional $600 for it.   Front desk refused to move him and told us they were sold out. The property is well-maintained and instantly makes you feel like you’re on vacation. The room is decent. If there’s anything negative, I would say the bathroom/shower could use a little facelift. We had a Conair hair dryer that looks like it’s from the 90s. The towels could certainly use some bleach. Other than that, staff is friendly and the property is absolutely gorgeous.

Sub par experience  Requests were ignored  Food was bland and tasteless  Drinks were not nuts watered down but had no alcohol in it  Rude bartender at  infinity pool Annoying that we had to pay tips for food that was already covered. Unacceptable

We opted to stay in our beack front bungalow given them an opportunity to hold their word. That night we finally got to sleep a normal evening.  Let me be clear, ALL the staff here are amazing, very helpful and kind! The location is excellent with one of a kind private beach bungalow with your own plunge pool.
