Hotel was great, great location, close to everything, very clean, rooms were spacious and comfortable. Pools were terrific, views were really nice. Waitstaff were attentive and friendly, overall a very nice place to stay.   Only negative was folks partying very late on the beach, & being very loud,  (till 3am) asked them nicely to keep it down, but didn't help, so recommend bring earplugs.

an absolutely incredible resort with delicious food, perfect for relaxing, enjoying the beach, having your privacy while also experiencing the fun aspects of town. my favorite part was Rogelio, our amazing server who took such great care of us at breakfast and dinner (ask for him at fuego restaurant!) 10/10 would recommend this vacation to everyone I know and will definitely go again!

Really nice resort with wonderful staff! Armando especially went out of his way to help us. We were a really large group, and he took care of all of us effortlessly. Most professional, nice, and fun guy! Our group of 16 never waited for a drink and he was an amazing bartender!!

On the beach and easy access to the beach. They have couple of restaurants with decent food with restaurants outside that you can walk to. The only problem we had was they tried to switch rooms on us stating they were providing an upgrade but that was not the case and we had to fight for the room that was booked. Besides that decent place!

Great location and experienced. But, by far the best and most memorable was one of the staff members, Rogelio.  He met me with a smile every morning at breakfast, learned my name and the name of my fiance, and went above and beyond to make sure everything we needed/wanted was taken care of.  Thank you so much, Rogelio!

We had an amazing vacation, and the best service every morning by Rogelio. Very sweet and kind person.  Clean hotel rooms, airco works really good. You will need it in Mexico haha! And a beautiful coral blue sea.

Absolutely beautiful views of the ocean! We really enjoyed the open air lounges and restaurants (note: if you are wanting air conditioning in the lounge/restaurants this is not the place for you. AC in your room only*). The staff here is amazing and made all the better by the personal touches/attention provided by Gilberto, Camela, Bety, Cesar, Benjamin and a big shout out to Chef Juan for seeing to our personal dietary needs. We are already looking forward to our next visit!

My family and I stayed here for a week and we absolutely loved it! The staff and the service are awesome. In particular Elizabeth and Rolegio. Rogelio made our visit very memorable, he made sure we were always satisfied and went above and beyond to make us feel happy.   Our family is vegetarian, and the staff at Fuego went out of their way to accommodate us, because of them we had so many options to choose from when eating.  The location is perfect, there is direct access to the beach, and both restaurants, Las Olas and Fuego have a beautiful view of the ocean. The resort is also within close proximity to 5th Avenue, great for taking a stroll in the famous tourist area.

My husband and I stayed here for our honeymoon and let me just say that anyone complaining is just miserable because it was above my expectations!! The resort/beach was beautiful. We stayed in the caribe’s located right on the beach with a private plung pool, which was so worth it. The beach is public and has a good bit of foot traffic, but the locals were respectful + you have a private section roped off with chairs just for you. The staff was amazing-they were all polite, attentive, and always making sure we were taking care of (we are a younger couple so having people to look out for us was extremely nice). Major shout out to Mota and Mariano for making this the most memorable trip.  10/10 recommend staying here for any occasion.

After reading the fantastic reviews my family and I (group of 8 across 4 rooms) decided to stay at this hotel for my sister's 50th birthday celebrations. With high expectations we were surprisingly disappointed by the lack of some fundamental amenities and services. We believe this could be due to the hotel changing ownership hands recently. Here is a summary of our experience below:   Positives:  - Fantastic location with easy access to the main strip, full of vibrancy, bars and restaurants, as well as having the beach within foot steps. - Beautiful grounds which were clean and well maintained. - Breakfast staff in Las Olas were fantastic- they provided a 5* plus service and went over and beyond to meet any requests. The front of house ladies at both Fuego and Las Olas were

Mahekal is a simple and nice hotel. The rooms are clean but very minimal. There are not many amenities in the hotel and no entertainment.   Staff are friendly, in particular Marcos from the restaurant who really made our time special.  Elezier was also great at booking our trips.   However, this hotel is extremely noisy due to the public beach. There is hotel music until 5 am at least and the bubble tea shop next door blasts music from 7am. It was hard to sleep most nights which made the trip less enjoyable.

Beautiful property, nicely maintained beach, excellent location on a pretty tree lined street in Playa del Carmen. We opted for fill all inclusive and probably should have just done half board to try some restaurants in town.  I would give 5 stars but they initially made errors in our reservation and put us in an incorrect type of room.  After being insistent and when the AC didn’t work properly, they moved us to a beautiful upgraded room.  Overall very pleased with the trip, food, drinks and gorgeous property.

We have been multiple times to Mahekal and this visit was exceptional as have been the past visits.  My husband and I take this week off when the kids are at camp and just relax and recharge.  The resort is so well kept and service is great.  Rogelio is our favorite server and makes us feel welcome and special.  They have a half board which is worth it but liked it better when you could get breakfast and dinner at Fuego.  Not a fan of buffets.  That is the only option now for breakfast.  I hope to see Manuel and Angel again on our next trip.  When you go ask for rooms in the 40's and 50's, which will put you at the center of the resort.  The 80's are loud because they are by the road.  Take a book and sunscreen and all else is provided for you!

We would like to thank the staff especially Eli the Concierge who helped us during our stay and was affable, and informative. Also Elizabeth at the Breakfast Buffet who greeted my wife ever morning and made us feel so welcome. Also Pedro, the waiter who remembered every thing we ordered and provided top notch service. What I’m saying is the staff is attentive and friendly, we couldn’t have asked for a more pleasant stay. The grounds are well kept and amazing filled with all the beauty you would expect in a great resort. We enjoyed our time there and will definitely return

We had an excellent stay and really enjoyed ourselves. The food was brilliant and the staff was perfect. We made many new friends, especially Rogelio our waiter in the morning....he actually brought my wife a blouse that his mother handmade! Just fantastic. Andres was our friend at the pool restaurant who helped us find things in town and give us extra info.....great people.   The rooms were nice, simple and comfortable. Bathrooms were nothing special but we didnt spend so much time in there anyway.  Location is lovely and that vacation feeling is 100%......we didnt want to com home. I would go back for certain!

Overall, the place is beautiful. Truly feels like you’re part of the jungle! Very relaxing. As far as activities go, there’s not many. Some night activities would be great, but there are none. Would not recommend for kiddos, but would recommend for a couple looking to get away. Armondo, our pool server was the absolute BEST!!! He is the most hard working staff we came across. We had a great time by the pool.

I am in Playa on business for 6 weeks and had some power issues at the apartment I am staying at. So, I came to this wonderful resort by myself.  I went to the resort spa this afternoon and it was incredible. From the moment you walk in the door you are greeted with welcoming smiles from Elsa and Alex, a cold aromatherapy infused towel, and ice cold bottled water. Alex walked me back to the changing area and waited for me to prepare for the ritual which he said is to cleanse the old energy and welcome in the new. You are then escorted to a hot tub where salts are added and you relax before being taken to a waiting room with iced green tea and more cold aromatherapy towels. I had an 80 min aromatherapy massage from Oseas. He was incredible. I usually do not have massages from men

We had such a delightful time! It was the most relaxing and enjoyable vacation I've taken in the last 9 years. The staff were so thoughtful -- Vianney went out of her way to set up birthday decorations for my wife after I told her were there to celebrate my wife's 40th. Rogelio was so kind and sweet to our kids, even thinking to add a seat cushion so our youngest could be more comfortable at meals.   The piña coladas were on point (best we tried, even of the in-town options), the pools were so nice, and we loved that each room had its own patio with hammocks.   I love that the resort is right in town and adjacent to the public beach, so you get a sense of community in PDC (though still touristy, I'll admit, it's not like you're far removed in the resort district). It was so easy

My wife and I stayed for a 15 day period all inclusive in suite 3201 and both of us had an excellent experience here. Very central location with rooftop pool and only 1 1/2 blocks from the beach!  Friendly staff, great food, beautiful rooms.  Stayed as an all-inclusive package and took shuttles to other two locations to experience their pools and beaches as well.  Would definitely go back!

Extremely LOUD techno head banging obnoxious music ALL day!  It’s ridiculous.  Not a relaxing resort.  Several people requested music to be turned down some, but were ignored by staff. This resort provided plenty amenities at a reasonable price point.  Service was good.  Food good. Aesthetics pleasant and well maintained and ample activities and music to meet the needs of all...young and mature.  Transportation between sister properties need a little attention and language skills could be considered when selecting direct service provides.

Only negative was our "concierge" trying to trick us into a time share presentation the moment we arrived. Not cool and put a bad taste in our mouths but by the end of the week we didn't care because the rest of our time there was great. We were on the first floor so not bothered by the rooftop noise. It's definitely more of a party vibe but you can also visit the sister resorts (Coco Beach and Playacar) for a more relaxed beach vibe.

Overall this was an amazing location and hotel.  I only have one issue.  You must be careful when walking around the pool deck.  Many people have fallen, my husband has been in physical therapy for his hand since the stay.  We also witnessed a gentlemen falling into the hot tub head first due to the slippery deck.  We told the hotel but they did nothing about it.  Please be careful.

Excellent hotel in the downtown playa area. The roof top pool is excellent for an escape off of 5th ave when needed. Be sure to see Freddy for top notch experience on the roof top. Over all love the entire experience reef28 has to offer. Would absolutely come back here again!

Miguel is the best ! Reactiv, super nice, smiling AND pro activ!!! He is the best waiter we had at the reef. The others are not always really good but miguel made a huge difference ! We are super happy when he is around because we know the service is going to be amazing and reactiv !

Best hotel in playa. Amazing rooftop vibes with friendly staff. Freddy and Anel hooked us up every day.  Food and drinks are great especially for an all inclusive. Would recommend 10/10 to family and friends.

During our 7 days we experienced all the restaurants and bars, and always found the staff to be quick to approach and provide great service. And the baja tacos are to die for. Honestly over the past 9 years of being in Mexico this has been one of the best experiences I’ve had! 100000000/10 recommend.

Great time vacations spent on the reef28!!! Best staff Girl, Paola was simply Amazing! Empathic, always available for our requests With a smile, professional and incredibly Kind!!! Best resident DJ there, btw!!!

Otoniel made our visit so special. What an amazing bartender and just such a wonderful person. It was like talking with an old friend. I wish everyone had his passion and just actually cared how your experience was. So amazing. Would come back to this resort just because of him.

We had a great time at The Reef 28. The rooftop pool had beautiful views. The staff was friendly and attentive. It is a town that loves to party, so music could be heard in the room during the morning and when going to sleep. I would still return and make this my primary choice to stay when in Playa Del Carmen.

This place is always amazing. Excellent service. I go several times a year. The staff is ALL amazing, but I want to give a few special mentions on an even more extraordinary job well done. Ivania at the front desk saw to it that an issue that I was having was quickly taken care of. She went above and beyond with her customer service. We will be back as we always are and we look forward to continuing excellent times and service! The rooms are excellent. The food is excellent. The food and drinks are amazing! Everything is really fresh and up to par. Usually resort food isn’t the greatest, but the food here surpassed my expectations. The staff is very friendly, especially Anel! She is very attentive and quick! You’ll definitely enjoy your stay here!

Freddy was the a great server! Very friendly and helpful. The rooms were very spacious and clean. The food was excellent. Pool was a fun atmosphere with good tunes. This is a great place to stay for a kid free weekend away with friends.

Excellent location and excellent service. Clean welcoming. Fantastic value for money. Just not our type of music played in the day by pool srea. Food was good and had everything you could need. Would recommend as a bolt hold for exploring Mexico

The Hotel is lovely but it wasn’t worth the money my Friends and I spent for a Bachelorette weekend. The Hotel doesn’t have room service, you can’t take food out of the restaurants. The crew on the rooftop was extremely rude our last night and constantly came over to our table to make sure we ate all the food we ordered. I personally prefer to stay at a different all inclusive resort for my next trip.

We love this hotel! Friendly staff, beautiful and clean hotel. This location is wonderful and within walking distance to beach and all the shopping for all your needs. Best of all, Onel our waitress every day except Mondays when she's off was the absolute best and we never had to ask for anything,  she just kept the food and drinks coming all day long!!!

Miguel - help with food and restaurants Carlos - for drinks, general advice and great conversation Joanna - always lovely energy and makes an amazing omelette Luis - head chef was so accommodating for my girlfriend who is vegetarian always going above and beyond to make her dishes not on the menu Zovietina - amazing server, always good energy and would make a fuss Andre - amazing waiter at the italian, great service and respect shown  Angel - great service and energy Surita - great service and energy

Also so thankful for Marco and the reception staff for answering any questions we could have. The hotel is very central in town so you can walk around to the shops and bars if you want. This hotel was great! I was looking for a adults focused hotel and this met all the expectations! The all inclusive package is really worth it! The treatment from hotel staff was great! Anel service is my favorite! I’ll keep coming back for more! I don’t know why this review made me do 200 characters but I’m trying to get there so I can post this review. It’s our honeymoon and we live in South Carolina

I enjoyed my stay at The Reef 28! I will definitely be returning again. The staff was very friendly and accommodating. The service was great! The spa was amazing and the food was delicious. Lobby bar drinks was the best! Thank you

The hotel was exceptional everything was perfect and I enjoyed every second of this vacation . The staff , food,and drinks were great and I will be back . So make sure I always have a spot left for me at this establishment

Best holiday ever! Staff are so friendly! He hotel its self is stunning and set in the perfect location! Close to the beach and also the close to 5th avenue! Great tequila tasting sessions and lots of day trips to be had!  Can’t wait to come back in 2023 🙌🏻
